product_title: Diamond Glass Tumbler | 6 Piece Set | Elegant Crystal Clear 245 ml Glasses

detail.name: Diamond Glass Tumbler | 6 Piece Set | Elegant Crystal Clear 245 ml Glasses

details.description_text: 6-Piece Crystal Clear Drinking Glass Set – 245 mlBring simplicity and sophistication to your drinkware collection with this beautifully crafted set of six crystal-clear glasses. Perfect for any occasion, these glasses are as durable as they are stylish.• Clear & Clean Design: Crafted from high-quality, crystal-clear glass that brings a fresh, modern look to your table. Ideal for showcasing the natural beauty of your drinks.• Complete Set of 6: Includes six glasses, making them perfect for family meals, hosting friends, or office refreshments.• Ideal Capacity: Each glass holds 245 ml, perfect for serving a variety of beverages, from water and juice to cocktails or iced tea.• Classic, Minimalist Style: With straight, smooth sides and a gently rounded base, the design complements any setting, from casual to elegant.• Built for Durability: The thick glass provides sturdiness, offering a reliable, chip-resistant option for regular use.• Multi-Purpose: Whether you’re enjoying a simple glass of water, serving juices at breakfast, or mixing cocktails, these glasses are versatile enough for any occasion.• Easy to Maintain: Dishwasher-safe for quick and effortless cleaning, perfect for busy households or office environments.Great for: Family gatherings, parties, office use, or as a thoughtful gift set for housewarmings or special occasions.

details.description_text: Brand: LAV Series: Derin Material: Premium European Crystal Glass Color: Clear Capacity: 300ml Diameter: 8cm Height: 9cm Pack: 1 Pcs LAV Derin Cocktail Glass - 1 PcsAdd a touch of modern elegance to your barware collection with the LAV Derin Cocktail Glasses. Crafted with a sophisticated square shape and clear European crystal glass, these glasses combine sleek design and durability for an exceptional drinking experience. Perfect for cocktails, mocktails, or any beverage, these glasses will elevate your next gathering with their stylish, contemporary look.Key Features:Modern Square Design: The bold square shape offers a stylish, contemporary aesthetic, perfect for impressing guests and adding a unique touch to any occasion.Premium Glass Construction: Made from high-quality, break-resistant European crystal glass, these cocktail glasses are built to withstand daily use while maintaining their clarity and strength.Perfect Size: With a 300ml capacity, these glasses are perfect for serving a variety of cocktails, drinks, and other beverages with just the right amount of space.Easy Care: Dishwasher safe for convenient and quick cleaning, ensuring that maintaining these glasses is hassle-free.Eco-Friendly: Made from 100% recyclable glass, the LAV Derin Cocktail Glasses provide an environmentally conscious choice for your drinkware needs.Gift-Worthy: With their modern design and practical functionality, these glasses make an excellent gift for friends, family, or colleagues on any occasion.Why Buy?Sleek and Modern Design: The square design offers a contemporary look that is perfect for both casual and formal gatherings, adding a stylish flair to your table.Durable Construction: Made from break-resistant crystal glass, these glasses are durable and can withstand frequent use without losing their clarity.Convenient and Easy to Clean: Dishwasher safe, these glasses are designed to be low-maintenance, making them perfect for everyday use.Environmentally Friendly: 100% recyclable, making them a responsible and sustainable choice for your home or business.Perfect Gift Idea: Whether for housewarmings, birthdays, or any special occasion, these glasses make a thoughtful and elegant gift.Elevate your next cocktail hour or dinner party with the LAV Derin Cocktail Glasses and experience the perfect blend of style, function, and durability.

This individual 315ml glass is designed to enhance your beer-drinking experience, offering a traditional shape to showcase the beer's clarity, colour, and effervescence. Crafted from clear and robust tempered glass, this tumbler is perfect for both everyday enjoyment and casual gatherings in your French home.The Ocean Pilsner Tumbler is built to last, able to withstand regular use. It is also conveniently dishwasher and refrigerator safe, making cleanup and chilling effortless. While the product details mention it's "Microwave Oven save," it is generally not recommended to microwave tempered glass due to potential stress on the material.
